chapter.text: Mont. Sinai
recorded scripture
Published en libr
frequented Shrine
exalted plafon
Mar set aflame
Your Lord's requital est unavoidable
ne force univers stop gxi
Tag ven when cxiel violently tondr
Mont visx out
Ve ke tag al disbelievers
who est en their blundering heedless
Ili herded Gehenna forcibly
This est Fajr en vi uz disbelieve
est this magic vi ne seg
Sufer brul Vi est pacient impatient gxi est des sam por vi! This est just requital ki vi did
righteous ind gxarden bliss
Ili gxu ki their Lord rezerv them; their Lord sxpar them retribution Infer
Mangx trink happily dors your works
Ili relax luxurious furnishings ni alumet them bel spouses
Por those kred their infan ankaux sekv them belief ni hav their infan join them! Ni neniam fail rekompenc them any work Cxiu ul est pag por ki li did
Ni supply them frukt viand ili am
Ili gxu drink neniam polluted neniam sinful trink
Serv them est servants protekt perl
Ili meet each ali reminisce themselves
Ili dir Ni uz est kind humil our popol
DI BEN us SXPAR us AGONDI ill VUND
Ni uz implore Him; Li est plej Kind Merciful
Vi remind popol. Kun your Lord's ben vi vi est nek soothsayer nor crazy
Ili dir Li est poet; just wait gxis li est dead
Dir Ir sur waiting mi wait vi
Gxi est their songx ke dikt their behavior est ili naturally wicked
Do ili dir Li far gxi all Instead ili est simply disbelievers
Let them produkt Hadith this se ili est truthful
Ili kre nothing? Est ili creators
Ili kre heavens ter? Ja ili ne hav certainty
Ili posed trezor your Lord Ili en est control
Ili grimp ladder Do enables them auxskult Let their listeners montr their proof
Li Does daughters while vi hav hav fil
Vi pet them any wage kaj ili sxargx thereby
Ili kon future Do gxi recorded
Ili plotting kaj scheming disbelievers' schemes backfire them
Ili hav another di DI? DI GLOR far HAV partners
When ili seg mas fal cxiel ili dir Piled nub
Disregard them ili meet tag en which ili strik
Ke tag their schemes ne protekt them nor vol ili help
Those transgress sufer retribution here plej de them ne kon
Vi steadfastly persevere port your Lord's ordon! - Vi est our okul - Glor lauxd your Lord when vi get
Ankaux dum nokt glor Him je dawn as stel fade for
